搒字的基本解释

搒
bàng
摇橹使船往前进，划船。

搒
péng
用棍棒或竹板打：“搒讯数百，卒无异辞”。

搒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péng］
［《廣韻》薄庚切，平庚，並。］
亦作“挷1”。
(1)掩；掩门。
(2)拷打。
(3)碰撞。
[②]［bàng］
［《廣韻》補曠切，去宕，幫。］
亦作“挷2”。
(1)摇撸使船前进。
(2)指行船途中停歇。
[③]［bǎng］
亦作“挷3”。
见“摽2搒”。

搒字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搒； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页446第22
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?北孟切，祊去聲。【說文】掩也。　又進舟也。【廣韻】搒人，船人也。與榜同。　又補曠切，音謗。義同。【廣韻】掉船一歇也。　又【唐韻】薄庚切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蒲庚切，?音彭。笞掠也。【前漢·張耳傳】吏搒笞數干。【註】捶擊之也。亦作榜。通作篣。　又【集韻】【韻會】?逋旁切，謗平聲。義同。　又【集韻】晡橫切，音祊。相牽也。或作㧍。　本作?。

字源演变：

小篆楷体

搒字的起名意思

暂无。

whip
Basic explanation of words
whip
bàng
Swing the scull to move the boat forward and row the boat.
whip
péng
Hit with a stick or a bamboo board: "Hundreds of inquiries, pawns have nothing to say."
whip
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［péng］
["Guangyun" Bo Gengqie, Ping Geng, and. ]
Also known as "Ji 1".
(1) Cover; cover the door.
(2) Torture.
(3) Collision.
[②]［bàng］
["Guangyun" fills up the kuang cut, goes down, and helps. ]
Also known as "挷2".
(1) Shake the ship forward.
(2) Refers to a stop during the journey.
[③]［bǎng］
Also known as "挷3".
See "Press 2".
whip
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　搒; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 446 22
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? North Mengqie, go away. [Said the text] also cover up.　Into the boat again. [Guang Yun] People in the boat, too. Same as the list.　 Make up the Kuang cut again, sound slander. The same meaning. [Guang Yun] Just take a break after dropping off the boat.　[Tang Yun] Bo Gengqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Pu Gengqie,? Yinpeng. Liao also plundered. [Previous Han·Zhang Erzhuan] The officials slapped and squeezed. [Note] It's also a blow. Also on the list. Pass for Zhuo.　 [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club]? Cut aside, slander the sound. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] 晡 crosscut, sound only. Linking also. Or make 㧍.　This work?.
